about_the_game:
Story introduction


On the continent of Dilwe, there are various mysterious races. For a long time, there have been wars among the major ethnic groups. Since Martin Luther, the ancestor, held up the first bronze sword, the fox tribe has finally got rid of the original Stone Age and moved towards a new civilization. Your family, the Xulian tribe, has assisted the chief of the Fox clan for generations. Your father and grandfather have also made outstanding achievements many times. The brother who has just defeated the northern wolf tribe with his father will be appointed as the candidate of the chief of Xulian tribe. He will continue to guard the fox tribe. But the sentry came to report that the border was in urgent need again. This time, it is the human invasion that we have to confront

About the protagonist


Fox, the second son of the chief of Xulian Tribe of Fox, is confident and has a little bad temper. He always hopes to prove to his father that he is no worse than his brother. On the day before the human invasion, brother Lex led the army to the stronghold to reinforce the patriarch. That night, the leader Pierre rebelled, and all the tribe members were killed, including Fox's father, Chief Graham. Only Elder Ebb and Fox escaped. His father temporarily instructed Fox to go to the stronghold to inform the patriarch Pierre about the rebellion. When they came to the stronghold, the brother did not arrive, At this time, the human race was in the city, so they fought with the patriarch. The patriarch was killed by miscellaneous soldiers, and the fox clan was defeated. The protagonist was rescued from the corpses by the villagers. He was intent on revenge, but the development of the situation was not as he thought. Fox did not even know who to revenge against, because what he faced was not a person or a group of people, but a thought that most people have, and your mission, Is to let Fox destroy, no, save the world

Operation guide

Use the left mouse button to adjust the direction Right click to move

Use the space or click the mouse to investigate the conversation

Other information

Game type: rpg (exploration, strategy, cultivation)
